column2: similar to the work of CITATION
column3: we adopt the view that replies in the sentences that are determined to be attitudinal and contain secondperson pronouns (you
column5: yourself) are assumed to be directed towards the recipients of the replies

column2: we extract all the named entities in a sentence using Stanfords Name Entity Recognizer CITATION

column1: Hence we apply LDA CITATION on texts to extract latent semantics of texts
